title: Red Crow Mysteries: Legion v1.0.0 (Full)
description:
WINNER OF THE BRONZE AWARD FROM POCKETGAMER!

Save mankind from a terrifying fate in this heart-pounding adventure!

Your ability to see other worlds makes you the only person who can win the eternal battle between good and evil. Explore dark and eerie locations to find clues, search for special items and solve tricky puzzles. 

Pass the ultimate test to prove that you are the only one able to defeat the impending threat and preserve the world as we know it.

- 73 hidden object scenes to search 
- 25 challenging mini-games to play 
- Three awesome chapters with six eye-catching locations 
- Three game play modes: easy, casual and adventure

COMPATIBILITY NOTES:

***Note*** This game supports high-end smartphones and tablets such as Nexus 7 and Nexus 10.

More info:
 <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.g5e.rcmlegion.android" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.g5e.rcmlegion.android</a>


Instructions:

1.Install APK
2.Copy 'com.g5e.rcmlegion.android' folder to 'sdcard/Android/Obb'
3.Launch the game
